title: Create markdown parser service
description:
Extract markdown parsing functionality into a shared service that can be used by multiple components (DocsViewer, Issue Detail, Version Viewer).

The service should:
- Parse headers (h1-h6)
- Parse bullet and numbered lists
- Parse bold and italic text
- Parse links
- Parse code blocks and inline code
- Emit events for parsed content

comments.author: human
comments.text: Extract markdown parser from DocsViewer into a shared service. Use events for communication.

checklist.item: Add event emission for parsed content
